description:
Disney Plus has been experimenting with bringing in Hulu and Fox materials to their streaming service. As such, the once completely family-friendly nature of the service has changed to include more mature films and shows. Now one such controversial R-Rated movie is climbing the charts at Disney Plus. Of course, in spite of the film’s [...]

title: Controversial R-Rated Movie Climbs Disney Plus Charts

description:

Now it looks like some Netflix viewers are warning each other over a new series that’s said to be quite disturbing. This new sci-fi series actually involves David Benioff & D. B.
